expo.name: React Native Flatlist Example
expo.description: Hello again, I welcome each and everyone of you. In this article, we will go through the process of making a example react native flatlist.As flatlists are vital parts of almost every app nowadays, The List view.Which can go from a flatlist of your contacts, to your entire app feed. You can find the entire Article here: https://reactnativemaster.com/react-native-flatlist-example
